markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 3" pfs="Standard">[Meld into Stone](/Spells.aspx?ID=188)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Earth" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=55" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 350 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Spell Lists**
[Elemental](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=5)

**Deities**
[Soralyon](/Deities.aspx?ID=128), [Yuelral](/Deities.aspx?ID=111), [Zevgavizeb](/Deities.aspx?ID=82)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 10 minutes
</row>

</column>

---

You merge with an adjacent block of stone with enough volume to fit you and your worn and held possessions. You must touch the stone when you Cast the Spell. You can hear, but not see, what's going on outside the stone, and you can cast spells while in the stone as long as they don't require line of effect beyond the stone.

 Significant physical damage to the stone while you are inside it expels you and deals 10d6 damage to you. [_Passwall_](/Spells.aspx?ID=216) expels you without dealing damage and ends _meld into stone_. You can Dismiss this spell.
name: Meld into Stone

</row>

<row gap="medium">
 

**Duration** 10 minutes
</row>
</additional-info>

---

<summary>
Meld into a block of stone.
</summary>
summary: Meld into a block of stone.
summary_markdown: Meld into a block of stone.
text: Meld into Stone Source Core Rulebook pg. 350 4.0 Traditions Arcane, Primal Spell Lists Elemental Deities Soralyon, Yuelral, Zevgavizeb Cast Two Actions somatic, verbal Duration 10 minutes --- You merge with an adjacent block of stone with enough volume to fit you and your worn and held possessions. You must touch the stone when you Cast the Spell. You can hear, but not see, what's going on outside the stone, and you can cast spells while in the stone as long as they don't require line of effect beyond the stone. Significant physical damage to the stone while you are inside it expels you and deals 10d6 damage to you. Passwall expels you without dealing damage and ends meld into stone . You can Dismiss this spell.
